remarks.format:
## Remarks 实例<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>时，将创建<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>对象引发<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>事件。 若要获取的新标识<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Voice%2A>，访问<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs.Voice%2A>事件的处理程序中的属性。
你可以更改中使用的语音<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>与中的任意<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>的<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A>方法或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>的<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>方法。
